This file contains the PGP keys of various developers.

Users: pgp < KEYS.txt
       gpg --import KEYS.txt
       Developers:
         pgp -kxa <your name> and append it to this file.
         (pgpk -ll <your name> && pgpk -xa <your name>) >> this file.
         (gpg --list-sigs <your name>
             && gpg --armor --export <your name>) >> this file.


pub   4096R/574AC196 2010-09-05
uid                  Andreas Pieber <anpieber@gmail.com>
sig 3        574AC196 2010-09-05  Andreas Pieber <anpieber@gmail.com>
sub   4096R/78056312 2010-09-05
sig          574AC196 2010-09-05  Andreas Pieber <anpieber@gmail.com>
